law.catch_line: A Child Abuse Medical Provider (Maryland CHAMP) may receive information from the Department and may ...
law.text:
A Child Abuse Medical Provider (Maryland CHAMP) may receive information from the Department and may consult with the Department on any case:
Referred from the Children in Need of Assistance program;
Concerning a child committed to the Department or a local department of social services; or
Concerning a child who is the subject of a child abuse or neglect investigation.
